movie_title: The bond between sisters ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: A relationship between sisters can be one of the closest there is. For audio and transcript download

vocabulary.definition: coming together again after being apart
vocabulary.example: The long-lost siblings are reuniting for a family reunion.

vocabulary.definition: oversimplified ideas or beliefs about a particular group of people or things
vocabulary.example: She doesn't conform to the stereotypes often associated with her profession.

vocabulary.definition: relating to or consisting of a phrase
vocabulary.example: Learning phrasal verbs can be challenging for English language learners.

vocabulary.definition: being the only one of its kind; unlike anything else
vocabulary.example: Her unique sense of style always stands out in a crowd.

vocabulary.definition: a paper or digital document providing exercises and questions for students to complete
vocabulary.example: The teacher handed out a worksheet to help the students practice their math skills.

vocabulary.definition: comply with rules, standards, or laws
vocabulary.example: She refused to conform to society's expectations and followed her own path.
